doc:
Rob Stone (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rob_Stone_(actor) 0 Rob Stone (born September 22, 1962) is an American actor and director from Dallas, Texas, best known for playing teen Kevin Owens on the 1985–1990 sitcom Mr. Belvedere. He later became a writer and director of documentary films, and also performed as part of a band. Rob_Stone ( born September_22_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor_and_director from Dallas , Texas , best_known for playing_teen_Kevin_Owens on the_1985 – 1990_sitcom_Mr._Belvedere . He later became a_writer_and_director of documentary_films , and also performed as part of a_band .
